climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Get loud, get retro: Shout your inner retro out loud with a bold color combination of black, grey and arcade game yellow, allowing you to make a performance with POP Silent Mouse in Blast Yellow
Bold, comfy, quiet: A compact and comfy wireless mouse with up to 24-month battery life that fits snugly in your palm, handbag and computer case, with SilentTouch Technology for whisper-quiet working
The emoji button: Press the colorful mouse's magic middle button to open a menu of emojis to use in your chats, or give it your own shortcut using Logitech Software (Windows and macOS only)
Shift gears on the fly: As if reading your mind, POP Mouse’s SmartWheel shifts from high-precision tracking to speed scroll mode, helping you whizz through long documents with one confident flick
FLOW between worlds: Connect to up to 3 devices on Windows, Mac, Chrome OS or Android using Bluetooth and glide between screens using the Easy-Switch button or FLOW
Aesthetic pair: Match your POP Mouse with the fun and bouncy typing experience of POP Keys wireless mechanical keyboard, with customizable emoji keycaps and cutting-edge media keys

Plastic parts in POP Mouse include certified post consumer recycled plastic (Blast: 46 percent; Daydream, Heartbreaker and Mist: 29 percent; Cosmos: 27 percent.). .Excludes printed wiring assembly (PWA) plastics, and packaging.
Certified carbon neutral: the carbon impact of POP Mouse has been reduced to zero.
body.description: Logitech POP Mouse - Silent Wireless Mouse Let personality POP on your deskspace and beyond with POP Mouse, your whisper-quiet, wireless mouse with fresh customization features. Take your self-expression further and download Logitech Software to customize the top button. Give it your own twist by assigning it to send your favorite emoji or another shortcut - such as Snip Screen, Mic Mute or Voice-to-Text. POP Mouse fits comfortably in your hand and slips easily into your pocket, handbag or computer case. SilentTouch technology makes every click whisper-quiet. The portable mouse's SmartWheel stays in sync with you, easily shifting from high-precision to speed scroll mode. Pair POP Mouse with up to 3 different devices at once, and use the Easy-Switch button to toggle between them. Alternatively, activate FLOW and glide between screens as you work, transferring text, files and images with a simple copy and paste. Connect the cordless mouse to your desktop, tablet or phone* using Bluetooth or a Logi Bolt USB receiver which you can purchase separately. With a classic Logitech promise of durability, POP Mouse is your companion for the long haul, with up to 24-month battery life** and auto-sleep power-saving technology that helps it last. Product details: Number of buttons: 4 Top button customizable with Emoji Software Sensor technology: Logitech High Precision Optical Tracking Battery type: 1 x AA battery (included) Battery life: Up to 24 months** Connection type: Bluetooth 5.1 Compatible with Logi Bolt USB receiver Wireless range: 32.81 ft (10 m) Compatible with Windows 10 or later, macOS 10.15 or later, iPadOS, Chrome OS and Android *Windows, macOS, Chrome OS, Android, iPadOS **Battery life may vary based on use and computing conditions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CUTE. COMFY. QUIET. The kind of mouse you can take everywhere. POP Mouse fits snugly in your palm, handbag and computer case — and with SilentTouch Technology, it’s as quiet as a cloud.

Previous page GET PLAYFUL WITH EMOJI Express yourself in chats with friends. Send your favorite emoji with one tap of the top button. MAKE THE BUTTON YOUR OWN Assign the button to any emoji you like using intuitive Logitech Options+ software. IT’S EVEN APP-SPECIFIC You can even assign the button to different shortcuts, like Snip Screen, across different apps. Next page 1 EMOJI 2 CUSTOMIZABLE 3 APP-SPECIFIC
SHIFT GEARS ON THE FLY As if reading your mind, the SmartWheel shifts from high-precision to speed scroll mode — helping you whizz through long pages with a flick of the wheel.

MULTI-DEVICE Easy-switch between up to 3 devices at a time (on Windows, Mac, Chrome OS, Android or iOS) using the Easy-Switch button beneath the mouse. FLOW BETWEEN WORLDS Transfer files, images and text easily between devices using Logitech Flow. Enable Flow via Logi Options+ app, available on Windows and macOS. EASY TO CONNECT Easily connect your POP Mouse using Bluetooth. Also compatible with Logi Bolt USB receivers which you can purchase separately. BUILT TO LAST With auto-sleep power-saving technology, POP Mouse lasts up to 24 months on a single battery which you can easily access via the magnetic top cover.

TRY THE FULL SELF-EXPRESSION EXPERIENCE Own your space with the right accessories to take your productivity and style to new levels. Discover POP Keys, StreamCam, G733 and Logitech Desk Mat. PAIR WITH POP KEYS Match your POP Mouse with the fun and bouncy typing experience of POP Keys. With customizable emoji keycaps and cutting-edge media keys. LEARN MORE KEEP YOUR DESK PROTECTED Complete your space with the Logitech Desk Mat: a colorful, anti-slip desk mat with a spill-resistant design. Choose from 3 colors to complement your POP Mouse. LEARN MORE BROADCAST YOURSELF Share your passion with Logitech StreamCam. Featuring pristine image quality, dual front-facing microphones, versatile mounting options, and USB-C connectivity. LEARN MORE SOUND AMAZING Discover the ultra lightweight, wireless G733 headset — featuring broadcast-quality mic filters that make your voice sound richer, cleaner, and more professional in a heartbeat. LEARN MORE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great overall ! Cute, quiet and functional
reviews.reviewText: I was drawn to this mouse because of the cute lavender/purple colors and because it is a silent mouse! It’s surprisingly fast and responsive, good weight, portable and easily connects to my work laptop and personal laptop, no lag time for me. I had an M330 silent plus (that broke within a year) and this mouse feels sturdier and even seems quieter to me, which I was pleasantly surprised by. It’s not intended to be ergonomic per se (there’s a whole category of mice for that if that’s what you’re looking for) yet it does have a slight curve to it that gives it a contoured feeling that’s more comfortable that smaller mice tend to be. I use it most of my work day without any issues, love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!!! I am obsessed!
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is SOO cute and I love it so much! I normally don't leave reviews but I loved this so much I had to. I'm a graphic designer and I bought this just to use for work and personal use. Not really a gamer so I can't speak to that but here is why I love it for a few reasons:- The design/color palette is so adorable and is just pleasing to look at- It fits great in my hand, but I do have smaller hands- The click on it is almost completely silent and feels oddly satisfying- The scroll is also really smooth/satisfying to use- I love the customizable buttons. I don't really use it for an emoji but I love that you can customize to another shortcut- The material itself does not feel cheap to me. I purchased another cheapo wireless mouse on Amazon before getting this one and you can tell the difference. I wouldn't say this is LUXURY by any means but it's definitely a bit nicer quality than a knock off cheap mouse.And finally the MAIN reason I LOOOVE this so much is because of the multi-device technology. If you download their software, you can use their "Flow" tool that allows you to easily switch the bluetooth mouse to another screen simply by moving the mouse off the edge of the screen.I bought this to use with my work laptop and personal laptop at one time so I can keep them both separate and it is almost a completely seamless transition between screens. You don't even need to push the button on the bottom of the mouse if you have Flow enabled. I use this with my logi keyboard (not the POP version but another kind) and it makes working feel more fun and cute (as dumb as that sounds lol). Just buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with this mouse and love the bright yellow! I don't do gaming so I can't comment on that but for everything else with my laptop, it works flawlessly. It's quiet, quick, and fits my hand perfectly. I thought my laptop was going bad but it turned out all I just needed this new mouse! I was sad when my old Logitech mouse died. It was made worse when I learned it isn't made any more but this one is just as good or better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute color with a long battery life
reviews.reviewText: Love this mouse! It was very easy to set up and the color is adorable. I've been using it for a few weeks for school and it is great. It is also very quiet, and the clicks are not distracting. It is light and portable, as I am able to take it school/home/library. So far so great! 5/5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and quiet
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse so much. It's small and cute and quiet. I love it. Also love that it just connects with bluetooth, the last wireless mouse I had had to use a little USB thing but this doesn't need that so yay

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great travel mouse.
reviews.reviewText: There is a lot of good to say about a Logitech mouse. This one however, I would have to say is a really great product that has its drawbacks for folks with large hands (me). It just seems small. Not to distract from the fact that it is well made, works perfectly. Connected instantly, and had the fun emoji button.The one thing I dont like about it, which is personal preference. It is silent. I dont hear/feel that click when I press the button. If that isnt an issue, and you have small to medium hands, this thing rocks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Upgrade Over the Microsoft Mouse
reviews.reviewText: I learned this year that Microsoft isn't making name-brand mice any longer. I have a few MS Bluetooth mice, but they are wearing out. I will do this review as a comparison to those mice because it's an upgrade in a few aspects.One, they both use a single AA battery for power. I love that. Mice with internalized batteries to charge are such a pain when they die.Two, this mouse is very quiet in comparison. I get self-conscious about how clicky I am with my other mice. This one is a very soft click.Its design is bright (I got the yellow one). I'll have a hard time losing this one.The cover is held on using magnets. Three tiny screws at the rear of the cover are enough. I was timid about this design choice, but it works fantastic. The only problem will be if the mouse happens to fall off your desk, the cover may detach, slide off somewhere, or break. But my current MS mouse is broken because of falls. A breakaway cover like this one would have been a better idea.Last, the tracking light doesn't flash when you pick up the mouse. The one on my MS mouse is constantly flashing. If I pick it up and look at it, it is still flashing. This may use a non-visible spectrum light because I can't get it to show up.This mouse is fantastic. I am ordering a backup now in case this wears out one day. The MS mouse was discontinued when I went to order a replacement. That was good, though, because now I have this mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great and it's so cute
reviews.reviewText: I love this product!! The color is so beautiful and it works great, it's cordless and easy to use. If you're looking for a mouse this is an excellent choice

I needed a little wireless mouse that was durable, small, and quiet. This hits all the marks! Satisfying to click with no loud sound. The magnetic parts are actually a godsend, since I drop my mouse All the Time (exactly how my last mouse broke), so not having fragile bits that click together has helped with the longevity. I've dropped this from 2 stories up and it's been more or less ok lol.
Connecting this mouse to my iPad Pro was simple. It works like a dream. The pop of purple makes work a lot more enjoyable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality connection for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using my mouse long enough to have worn out the battery once already, and I couldn't be much happier! This mouse does require AAA batteries once the one included wears out, but it seems to make good use of it. I constantly forget to turn this mouse off, and I was still impressed with how long it lasted before needed a replacement battery. To replace the battery, you remove the upper casing from the base, which is a little tricky, and a lot stressful. This is the one place I really have a complaint about this device. Though there have been no problems yet, the plastic does not feel thick or strong enough to handle being pulled off the base frequently without eventually breaking, which is my concern.I have my mouse connected to three different devices and have tried it with others. It connects pretty quickly and switches between three saved devices with a push of a button. It is easy to connect to Bluetooth devices, and works just as well on Windows, Mac, and IOS (iPad) from my experience so far. The mouse moves smoothly and quickly, and though it performs better on one, works decently well without a mousepad as long as you have a flat-ish surface. The Bluetooth is quite strong, I can use my mouse from several meters away with none to few connection issues, which is better performance than other wireless mice from a similar pricepoint that I have tried.The plastics are soft and comfortable to the touch, and the rubber-y grip on the wheel makes scrolling very smooth and easy. From the pictures I saw I expected this mouse to be flatter and shorter than it actually is. This means that for a small hand, this mouse is also more ergonomic than I expected, and though this certainly wouldn't be the case for everyone, I actually found that I had less wrist pain after hours of use than with the more "traditional" mouse I had been using prior to this one.I would buy this mouse again in a heartbeat. It is cute, comfortable for my smaller hands, and feels like a much "higher end" device at a reasonable price-point for the average user.

The media could not be loaded. Best mouse ever. I don’t use the big button in the middle for emojis but you can customize it whoever you want. It works on my Mac and iPad and I can even switch screens without having to do it manually. I love that the clicks are mostly silent and the colour is to die for.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Bluetooth mouse and well designed!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 of these devices (I was going to type mice but decided against it!) for both myself and my father-in-law. I have a newish MacBook Air M1 and my father-in-law has a MacBook Air from about 6 or 7 years ago. The construction is awesome, the mouse feels good in your hand and they paired with the laptops with no issues. The device allows you to pair to 2 separate computers using a slider switch located on the bottom. The battery compartment is located under the two buttons which can be easily lifted as they are held down by a "just strong enough" magnet which I find is a very astute and intelligent design. I use mine on a daily basis and have had no issues whatsoever. Logitech is a brand name that I trust and they tend to build excellent products, this mouse proves as much. So far the battery use is minimal, almost uncanny. I would highly recommend this mouse and you should sigh a sense of relief as when you do order it, you've made the right choice!
